input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product specification:
Lumisol Solar Color Dragonfly Pool Light

Product features:
Charged by the sun during the day.
Dragonfly automatically illuminates and changes color at night
Color-changing LED (Red, Green, Blue)
Perfect for decorating and lighting your garden, pond, and/or pool
Rechargeable battery included
Light will operate 6 to 8 hours after a full charge
environmentally friendly,energy-saving, reduces carbon emission
3.94 x 5.63 x 5.12 inches.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Want to transform your outdoor space into a captivating oasis? Look no further than the Lumisol Solar Color Dragonfly Pool Light! With its color-changing LED and rechargeable battery, this light is perfect for decorating and lighting your garden, pond, and/or pool. The environmentally friendly and energy-saving light is charged by the sun during the day, so you can enjoy its automatic illumination and color-changing magic for up to 6-8 hours after a full charge. Measuring only 3.94 x 5.63 x 5.12 inches, this light is easy to use and install, and will reduce your carbon emission. Get your hands on the Lumisol Solar Color Dragonfly Pool Light today and take your outdoor space to the next level!
input_text.Response B: Ooh! Look at this cool pool light! 🐠 It's a colorful dragonfly that shines bright at night! 🌟 It uses the sun's energy to light up, so it's good for the planet and your wallet! 🌱💰 The dragonfly changes colors, too! 🌈 Red, green, and blue, oh my! 🎉 It's perfect for decorating your pool, garden, or pond. 🌿🐸 And the best part? It's rechargeable, so you can use it again and again! 🔋💥 So, get ready to light up your outdoor space with this super cool Lumisol Solar Color Dragonfly Pool Light! 💥🌟

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
